lead_paragraph: The Mexican government criticized Donald Trump's policy proposals on immigration, border security and U.S.-Mexico relations Wednesday, saying they were tainted by bigotry.

headline.main: Mexican Government Dismisses Trump Border, Migration Plan
headline.print_headline: Mexican Government Dismisses Trump Border, Migration Plan

snippet: The Mexican government criticized Donald Trump's policy proposals on immigration, border security and U.S.-Mexico relations Wednesday, saying they were tainted by bigotry....
